channel.title: Lore of the Legion on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Lore of the Legion on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Rettet Den Commander
item.description: Rettet den Kommander Rain and thunder is punctuated by the howls of undead above. The rainwater exits the drainage pipe. Your Chosen, Zora, will lead an assault on the main gates as a distraction. This is a stealth and speed mission. Get in. Get the Commander. Get out. Whatever you do, don’t let the undead learn the Legion’s secrets. Do not fail.
